Work Experience
  • Centre for Open Source Technologies (COST)
    Jan 2007 - Dec 2007
    JUNIOR WEB DEVELOPER

    The Centre for Open Source Technologies is Tshwane University of Technology's in-house development department. COST was responsible for many of the universities websites and academic related systems.

    • Junior Web Developer
      • I was part of a team that developed an academic system called Sinew. I was responsible for developing the web test module, lecturer assessment module, class list module and the document management module.
      • I developed an online aptitude testing application.
      • I helped a lecturer develop his online source code marking solution
    • Interface and website design
    • Testing, documentation and code review
  • Student Village
    JAN 2008 - PRESENT
    IT MANAGER

    Student Village is a youth marketing/career development agency that loves to make use of the online environment. Student Village builds anything from custom campaign-focused mini-sites to large information systems.

    • Lead systems development
      • I have developed a Bursary Management System and a CV Application Database system that Student Village rents out to their clients.
      • I develop internal application that help business processes.
        • The promoter payment portal is an application that stores information about Student Village's promoters and the campaigns that they have been working on. Every week a payment files is generated which gets uploaded to the bank.
        • Media booking system that manages the inventory and bookings for SMS's campaigns, emails campaigns, posters and online banners.
        • I developed a Brand ambassador portal that helps brand managers manage their ambassador programs more efficiently.
      • I develop custom applications for Student Villages clients.
        • The FNB Investment challenge application is a social stock market simulator where players battled it out to be the king of the JSE.
        • The BlackBerry Superstar Search was a music voting website where unsigned musicians uploaded their tracks in order to win amazing prizes.
      • I develop websites for Student Village that help the company with it's strategic vision.
        • Have a look at the following websites: studentmarketing.co.za, uvillage.co.za, gradx.net and studentvillage.co.za
    • System administrator
      • Administer Microsoft Windows Server and workstations for 26 users.
      • Managing the purchasing, installation and maintenance of all IT related equipment. From printer cartridges to servers.
      • I make sure that the companies IT infrastructure is reliable and current.
    • Webmaster
      • Purchase and the renewal the Student Village's domains.
      • Manage Google Analytics and website reporting.
      • Constantly updating all the websites for facebook and SEO friendliness.
      • Maintaining the linux servers and keeping them up to date and making sure that the backups are running optimally.
